casebody.data:
STOKES
v.
STOKES 82A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 21, 2018 Rebecca K. Watts, Attorney at Law, Monroe, for Stokes, Bree Rushing. Kristen Shearin, Attorney at Law, Brione B. Pattison, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Stokes, William Corey (II)

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of May 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of May 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of June 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
